    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, androidx.activity.OnBackPressedDispatcherOwner, androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, androidx.core.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, androidx.core.view.KeyEventDispatcher.Component, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class MealDetailActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Activity for controlling the Detail Screen of a Meal, which is shown if a user wants to look at detailed information of a Meal in the app.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

      • cancel

        public void cancel(android.view.View view)
        Click Listener for the cancelButton. Closes the Dialog Window and returns to previous window.
        Parameters:
        view - Holds the view which was clicked. Here: cancelButton.

      • like

        public void like(android.view.View view)
        Click Listener for the likeButton. Is called if user clicks on likeButton. Performs the appropriate actions for liking a meal by communicating with the backend and updating views.
        Parameters:
        view -

      • dislike

        public void dislike(android.view.View view)
        Click Listener for the dislikeButton. Is called if user clicks on dislikeButton. Performs the appropriate actions for disliking a meal by communicating with the backend and updating views.
        Parameters:
        view -

      • deleteLikeDislikeInDB

        private void deleteLikeDislikeInDB()
        Starts Backend DELETE-Request to delete likes or dislikes from DB.

      • insertOrUpdateLikeDislikeInDB

        private void insertOrUpdateLikeDislikeInDB(int type)
        Starts Backend POST-Request to update or insert like, dislike in DB.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the like. Like: 1. Dislike: -1.

      • getLikeDislikeState

        private void getLikeDislikeState()
        Starts Backend GET-Request to check if user likes, dislikes or is neutral to the currently displayed Meal.

      • likeDislikeStateHandler

        private void likeDislikeStateHandler(org.json.JSONObject response)
        Completion Handler for Request to Backend sent by function getLikeDislikeState().
        Parameters:
        response - The JSON Response of the backend.

      • updateAndShowLikeDislikes

        private void updateAndShowLikeDislikes(int state,
                                       java.lang.String likes,
                                       java.lang.String dislikes)
        Change Button Colors specific to the Like-State of the user regarding this meal and set Number of Likes and Dislikes.
        Parameters:
        state - tells if user likes, dislikes or is neutral regarding the displayed meal.
        likes - Number of likes of the meal.
        dislikes - Number of dislikes of the meal.

      • highlightLikeDislikeButtons

        private void highlightLikeDislikeButtons(boolean like,
                                         boolean dislike)
        Highlight the Buttons appropriately, if the User has liked/disliked the Meal or nothing of both.
        Parameters:
        like - true, if user likes the displayed meal.
        dislike - true, if user dislikes the displayed meal.

      • updateLikeState

        private void updateLikeState(int type)
        Update the Like State for a given Like type: 0: neutral, 1: like, -1: dislike.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of like.

      • informDelegate

        private void informDelegate()
        Informs the registered Delegate that changes have occurred and passes the updated Meal Object to the Delegate.
